str2: Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To lead astray, deceive, cause to wander. From plane; to roam.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From a derivative of the base of mukaomai; to make mouths at, i.e. Ridicule.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular

str2: A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To sow, spread, scatter. Probably strengthened from spao; to scatter, i.e. Sow.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To reap, gather, harvest. From theros; to harvest.
